class_name: Database Design and Implementation for Business
comments: Challenging course but highly informative and useful in industry.
I already came into the class knowing Python due to my professional background. It was very easy for me.
By far my most difficult classes given how little I knew about networking. Assignments took a long time.
Mathematically challenging, but essential concepts to understand for the field of DS/ML.

class_name: Foundations of Analytics and Data Visualization
comments: R is a difficult language to learn, but the professor was very helpful and the assignments were very useful.
Very quickly covers the basics, but the assignments allow for a lot of creativity and learning.
